sentences.en: “Most people when they turn 50 begin to look at forgetfulness with more seriousness, ” said Dr. Gene Cohen, the director of the Center for Aging, Health and Humanities at George Washington University.
sentences.cn: "大多数人们步入50岁后便开始严肃地看待健忘这个问题了,"乔治华盛顿大学人类老化,健康及人类研究中心的吉恩柯翰博士说.

sentences.en: “The bottom line question to ask is, Is your forgetfulness fundamentally interfering with how you function?
sentences.cn: "要问的底线问题是,你的健忘是否真的根本性地妨碍了你的行动?"

sentences.en: All this is not to suggest that forgetfulness doesn't come at a price.
sentences.cn: 这一切并不意味着遗忘不需要代价.

sentences.en: He feared she would berate him for his forgetfulness.
sentences.cn: 他担心,由于健忘又要挨她的训斥了.

sentences.en: Health experts say that stress can come with some pretty surprising symptoms—from forgetfulness to nausea to skin rashes.
sentences.cn: 健康专家们认为压力会伴随着许多令人惊讶的征兆而来——从健忘到恶心，甚至是皮疹。

sentences.en: Her forgetfulness is due to advancing age.
sentences.cn: 她由于年事已高而变得健忘。

sentences.en: How long will humanity continue to suffer in their forgetfulness?
sentences.cn: 人性还将在失忆中被折磨多久?

sentences.en: If there is one thing that upsets me, it's my forgetfulness.
sentences.cn: 如果有什么使我恼火的话, 那 就是 我的健忘.

sentences.en: In the forgetfulness, a dance of non - truth followed.
sentences.cn: 在遗忘中, 接着的 是非 真相之舞.

sentences.en: It is a place of awakening and a place of forgetfulness.
sentences.cn: 这就是唤醒的地方和容易忘记的地方.

sentences.en: Low air pressure makes people feel relaxed and creates forgetfulness.
sentences.cn: 低气压使人放松,令人容易健忘.

sentences.en: Remember is a form of meeting. Forgetfulness is a form of freedom.
sentences.cn: 记忆是一种相聚的方式. 忘却是一种自由的方式.

sentences.en: Remembrance is a form of meeting. Forgetfulness is a form of freedom.
sentences.cn: 追忆是一种会面. 遗忘是一种自由.

sentences.en: The first symptom of Alzheimer's may be mild forgetfulness.
sentences.cn: 老年性痴呆症的早期症状可能是轻微的健忘.

sentences.en: Why have these souls gone into forgetfulness?
sentences.cn: 为什么这些灵魂进入了遗忘?

sentences.en: Why have these souls gone into forgetfulness? Forgetfulness occurs for many reasons.
sentences.cn: 为什么这些灵魂进入了遗忘? 遗忘的发生有许多原因.

sentences.en: You forgot again? I'm simply fed up with your forgetfulness.
sentences.cn: 你又忘了? 我受不了你的健忘了啦.
